name: Delta Table Delete View for Incremental Load

content.query:
USE warburg;
GO

CREATE OR ALTER PROC deltaTableDeleteViewForIncrementalLoad @MainContainer NVARCHAR(50), @StorageFileLocation NVARCHAR(50), @LastProcessDate NVARCHAR(50)
AS
BEGIN

DECLARE @statement VARCHAR(MAX)
SET @statement = N'CREATE OR ALTER VIEW '+@StorageFileLocation+'_delete AS
    SELECT
        *, ''Delete'' as Operation
    FROM
        OPENROWSET(
            BULK ''https://warburgdeltatables.dfs.core.windows.net/' +@MainContainer+ '/' +@StorageFileLocation+ '-delete/'',
            FORMAT = ''DELTA''
        ) AS [RESULT]
    WHERE
        ModifyDate >= CONVERT(datetime2,'''+@LastProcessDate+''', 127)
'
EXEC (@statement)
END
GO
